findings.reasoning: This is a genuine vulnerability, not mentioned in ground truth. It meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) The issue ACTUALLY EXISTS in the code (missing pETH transfers), 2) There is a CONCRETE attack scenario described, 3) It does NOT require a trusted role to be compromised, 4) The impact is genuine (arbitrary pETH balance inflation and real ETH drainage), and 5) It is NOT a design choice, informational issue, security theater, out of scope, or mischaracterization.

This is a genuine vulnerability, not mentioned in ground truth. It meets all BONUS_VALID criteria: 1) The issue ACTUALLY EXISTS in the code (double increment of balances[0]), 2) There is a CONCRETE attack scenario described, 3) It does NOT require a trusted role to be compromised, 4) The impact is genuine (DoS on withdrawals), and 5) It is NOT a design choice, informational issue, security theater, out of scope, or mischaracterization.

notes: The target vulnerability (reentrancy in add_liquidity) was not identified in the findings. The findings identified two genuine vulnerabilities (missing ERC20 transfers and incorrect balance update) that were not part of the ground truth.
